ABBR	Abbreviation, Abbreviation, Acronym, Contraction
ENTY	Entity, Identity, Identity, Substantiality
DESC	Description and abstract concept, Comprehension, Interpretation, Expressing
HUM	Human being, Homo floresiensis, Person, Homo luzonensis
LOC	Location, Geolocation, Location, Geographic coordinates
NUM	Numeric value, Numeric data, Numeric symbol, Numerical representation
